metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5697 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The get_bitmap_file function in drivers/md/md.c in the Linux kernel before 4.1.6 does not initialize a certain bitmap data structure, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information from kernel memory via a GET_BITMAP_FILE ioctl call. Benjamin Randazzo discovered an information leak in the md (multiple device) driver when the bitmap_info.file is disabled. A local privileged attacker could use this to obtain sensitive information from the kernel.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:
